summary:
Cefalexin is a strong medicine used to fight bacterial infections. It works by attacking the bacteria's cell walls. This antibiotic is good for treating ear, skin, bone, joint, and urinary tract infections. It can also help with certain types of pneumonia and strep throat.

Common side effects include stomach problems and diarrhea. People with severe penicillin allergies should avoid it. Cefalexin has been around since 1969 and is widely used, being one of the most prescribed medications in the US, Canada, and Australia.
title: Cefalexin
